entities.name: HeadlessX
observations: Handles fingerprinting, behavior simulation, WAF bypass
Configured via HEADLESSX_BASE_URL, HEADLESSX_TOKEN env vars

entities.name: Local Luminati Proxy Manager
observations: Local proxy manager for residential IP rotation
NO cloud dependencies - fully local deployment
Configured via BRIGHTDATA_CUSTOMER_ID, BRIGHTDATA_ZONE, BRIGHTDATA_PASSWORD env vars

entities.name: Unified Scraper Architecture
observations: Single configuration: HeadlessX + Local Luminati Proxy for all platforms
Returns minimal fields: URL, description, skills only

entities.name: Job Scrapper Project
observations: Skills analytics platform for LinkedIn, Indeed, Naukri
Tech stack: Python 3.13.3, HeadlessX, Local Luminati Proxy, Streamlit, SQLite
Focus: skill trend analysis with MIND-TechAI ontology (3333 skills)
Legacy code moved to _deprecated folders (2025-10-11) to prevent hallucination

entities.name: Active Codebase Structure
observations: src/analysis/ - Skill analysis and visualization modules
src/_deprecated_ui/ - Legacy UI components (DO NOT USE)
